mapper.select:
select 1 from sys_role where enname = #{enname}
and enname != #{o_enname}

select a.id,a.name,a.parent_id,case when isnull(b.menu_id) then 'false' else 'true' end as `checked`, case when isnull(b.menu_id) then 'false' else 'true' end as `open`, case when type = '1' then 'fa fa-edit' else 'fa fa-cog' end as icons from sys_menu a left join sys_role_menu b on a.id = b.menu_id and b.role_id = #{roleId}

select a.id,a.name,a.parent_id,null as checked,null as `open`, case when type = '1' then 'fa fa-bank' else 'fa fa-sitemap' end as icons from sys_org a union select a.id,a.name,a.dept_id as parent_id,case when isnull(b.user_id) then 'false' else 'true' end as checked, case when isnull(b.user_id) then 'false' else 'true' end as `open`,'fa fa-user' icons from sys_user a left join sys_role_user b on a.id = b.user_id and b.role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_role(id, enname, name, role_type, data_scope, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks,status) values (#{id}, #{enname},#{name},#{roleType},#{dataScope}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy},#{updateDate}, #{remarks},#{status})
mapper.delete: delete from sys_role where id in #{id}
